products.title: Skye Raven Black (Blackout)
products.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Black - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Unilux Pvc Blackout Black Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: Their unilux pvc blackout roof blinds come in their most popular colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. This flame retardant fabric has an fibreglass core and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction. Product id: db-srb0034 fabric colour: black material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes unilux pvc blackout black velux keylite fakro dakstra in black.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Ebony - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Infusion Solar Black Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar black pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0009 fabric colour: black headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Roller, 4069 Black - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Roman Blind, 6519 Structured Black  - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Soft lighting effects - semi-transparentnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. Installs in minutes with the unique velux pick&click. System. products.title: Black (3009) (Blackout)
products.description: The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day. Total blackout - best on the market. Oeko-tex certified. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window. Available in 24 colours. Installs in minutes. Buy made to measure black (3009) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds.

products.title: Structured Black (6519)
products.description: Explore the infinite potential of beautiful fabrics and be inspired by the soft styling effects that make this collection refined and original. And due to the roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice. Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects. Flexible and stepless positioning. Interchangeable fabrics. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning.

products.title: Black (1047)
products.description: The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy. Blackout effect. Flexible and stepless positioning. Improved insulation.

products.title: Black &Amp;amp; White (3009 &Amp;amp; 1016)
products.description: The velux duo blackout blind is a blackout blind and a pleated blind in one. It offers the best of both worlds, blackout at anytime and softly diffused natural light all day. It is available in all blackout blind colours in combination with a white pleated blind. Blackout at anytime. Oeko-tex certified. Softly diffuses incoming daylight. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
